overview: Ashley Chism Bampfield started Tulip Marketing & Communications in 2007. Ashley is an M.B.A graduate from the Fogelman College of Business and Economics at the University of Memphis and has more than ten years of marketing and communications experience. Companies she has worked for include Amsurg, Katcher Vaughn & Bailey Public Relations, Methodist Healthcare, Le Bonheur Children’s Medical Center and Union Planters Bank (now Regions). Ashley’s work has produced numerous awards from the Healthcare Marketing Report and Public Relations Society of America. She is a graduate of the prestigious Maurice Elliott Leadership Institute and has written several nationally published healthcare-related articles.

relationships.title: Vice President of Marketing and Communications
